annotations.description: It was a very watchable match. Great goals and there was plenty of action at both ends of the pitch. No regrets about following this game. Barcelona had more of the game and were superior. Their manager will certainly be the happier of the two managers. Both sides adopted slow build up play tactics today.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) rises above the defenders and places a towering header towards the roof of the net, but Claudio Bravo is prepared and leaps to thwart him. Now Real Madrid have a corner.

Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) misses a great chance! He latches on to a fine cross into the box, but his effort misses the right post by a whisker.

annotations.label: corner

Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) gets himself into a promising goalscoring position, but he blazes the ball high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) was quite harsh and David Fernandez Borbalan didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

That was a brilliant piece of goalkeeping! Claudio Bravo dived superbly to block a header by Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) from around the penalty spot. His effort was directed straight towards the left post, but Claudio Bravo pulled off a remarkable save!
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball

The linesman raises his flag for offside before Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) heads on.

Claudio Bravo earns applause from the crowd! He dives superbly to deny a dangerous first time effort from the edge of the six yard box. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) was the player who tested the keeper's reflexes. Nice goalkeeping skills.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) slams the ball from a long range free kick. He should have curled it higher to avoid hitting the wall.

annotations.label: whistle

So far we have been witnesses to an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will not be a decline in the spectacle in the second half. Great display from Barcelona so far, looking at stats you have to say that they were the better side during that opening 45 minutes. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.
